title: Get clearance from Jal
content:
The player can't get into the Mine Entrance without clearance from Captain Jal Degreene.
 * Teleport to Hopeport, bring Captain Jal up to speed in Captain Degreene's Office and ask for clearance to enter the mine.
 * Completion will start the On the trail of corruption quest.


 * Access to Mine of Mantuban episode icon.png Mine of Mantuban
 * 62,300 Scout icon.png Scout XP
